thread.title: Berlin to host Maccabi Games, biggest Jewish sporting event in EuropeTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Berlin to host Maccabi Games, biggest Jewish sporting event in EuropeTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Berlin to host Maccabi Games, biggest Jewish sporting event in EuropeTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Berlin to host Maccabi Games, biggest Jewish sporting event in Europe Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
The Maccabi Games are the biggest Jewish sporting event in Europe and will be held at the Olympia Park in Berlin from 27 July to 5 August 2015.
Originating in the 19th century as a competition between members of the Jewish Sports Association, the Games have reached Olympic level today and are recognised as a sporting event of the highest calibre.
Away from all the action, there are many opportunities to learn more about Jewish history in Berlin. The Jewish Museum, for example, is well worth a visit and provides a fascinating insight into Jewish customs and traditions.
Source: GNTB
